highlightedJobListings.description:
**Job Summary:**

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Go Developer with extensive experience in IoT development to join our team. The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, AWS IoT Core, and a strong understanding of BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) and MESH networking protocols. This role involves designing, developing, and deploying scalable IoT solutions while ensuring high performance and security.

**Key Responsibilities:**

Design and develop IoT applications using Go and integrate them with AWS services.
Implement BLE and MESH networking protocols to enable communication between IoT devices.
Develop and optimize AWS Lambda functions for real-time IoT data processing.
Design and maintain DynamoDB tables for efficient storage and retrieval of IoT data.
Work with AWS IoT Core for device management, MQTT messaging, and data streaming.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop scalable and secure IoT solutions.
Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code following best practices.
Monitor and optimize the performance of IoT systems and troubleshoot issues.
Ensure security best practices are followed in IoT communication and data handling.

**Required Skills & Qualifications:**
5+ years of experience in backend development with Go (Golang).
Strong understanding of IoT architecture and protocols (MQTT, CoAP, BLE, MESH, etc.).
Hands-on experience with AWS services, including AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, AWS IoT Core, API Gateway, S3, and CloudWatch.
Proficiency in BLE communication and experience working with MESH networks.
Experience in real-time data processing and event-driven architecture.
Strong knowledge of RESTful APIs and microservices architecture.
Experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus.
Familiarity with security best practices for IoT and cloud-based applications.
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in an agile environment.
Strong communication skills and ability to work in a team.
highlightedJobListings.title: Senior Go Developer (IoT Specialist)

highlightedJobListings.description:
**Senior Backend Engineer - Backend and AI Inference platform
**
CTC - 50-60 LPA

**About RenderNet**
RenderNet is building the next generation of AI powered story telling tools which turbo charges the productivity for creatives across the globe.

**About the role**
As we scale RenderNet, we are looking for experienced systems engineers to build new products and scale our systems, platforms and processes. The role requires you to be ready to be in a fast iterative build cycle as well as keep an uncompromising watch on scalability and reliability of the platform. This role puts you right at the center of the action. If you're eager to make a real impact, seek a challenge that drives you forward, and want to head home each day feeling accomplished, this role is perfect for you.

**What you’ll do**
* Design and build systems/platforms that power the inference across all the RenderNet products.
* Work closely with the product and the engineering teams to build new features, tools and systems
* Accelerate engineering productivity by empowering your fellow engineers with excellent tooling, processes and systems
* Ensure the reliability of the systems we create, including taking part in an oncall rotation to handle critical incidents when needed.


**Required Skillsets**
* Over 5 years of experience in engineering roles focused on building and scaling machine learning platforms, developing real-time systems, and a strong understanding of event-driven architectures.
* A background in building and deploying inference platforms in production will be considered a plus
* Having worked with production MLOps, ML deployments and ML pipelines an added advantage
* Strong programming skills and ability to write structured, maintainable code
* Ability to rapidly prototype solutions and iterate with tight product deadlines


**You’ll thrive if you are**
* A detail-oriented individual while keeping the bigger picture in mind
* Have a humble attitude, an eagerness to help your colleagues, and a desire to do whatever it takes to make the team succeed
* You love building good software abstractions, you care about code quality and writing maintainable code
* You are intensely resourceful and you can deeply about technology, your colleagues and end-users
* Have worked before in an fast paced early-stage company
* You own problems end-to-end.
highlightedJobListings.title: Senior AI Backend Engineer

highlightedJobListings.description:
About Astuto:
We aim to build an AI-first Cloud Efficiency Platform that helps businesses maximize the ROI on public cloud investments. 

Given the increase in complexity and cost of cloud infrastructure and services, this space has an enormous opportunity. Over $600 billion is being spent on the public cloud, and an estimated $180 billion is being wasted. In addition, a lack of expertise as complexity and scale increase is a big challenge for organizations.

Astuto is establishing an engineering team in Bengaluru and is on the lookout for exceptional founding engineers to drive our vision.

About the Role
We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer / Lead who can own and drive our Core Platform and Optimization Engine. This entails designing, developing, and scaling key components of our product. This is a hands-on role along with leading a small team of engineers.
Key Responsibilities
•	Lead feature development from conception to deployment, ensuring high-quality execution.
•	Efficiently scale the APIs, Data Pipelines, and Processing components of the core platform
•	Enhance the Optimization Engine as per requirements
•	Own the development of new Cost Optimization Rules, which will entail a deep dive into AWS services and identify potential optimization opportunities.
•	Ensure high availability, reliability, and performance of applications.
•	Mentor and guide junior engineers, fostering growth and maintaining high development standards.
•	Thrive in a fast-paced startup environment, demonstrating agility and strong problem-solving skills.
•	Build and scale SaaS applications from 0 to 1, tackling the challenges of complex data architectures in growing products.

Required Skills & Experience
•	5-8 years of hands-on experience in software development.
•	Proven experience working with large-scale products hosted on AWS.
•	Deep expertise in AWS services optimization for performance and cost, with in-depth knowledge of at least two Managed AWS Services (other than EC2).
•	Direct experience in reducing AWS costs for large-scale organizations.
•	Proficiency in Python, Node.js, or Java for backend development.
•	Strong expertise in relational databases such as PostgreSQL or MySQL. Analytics DB experience is a plus.
•	Solid understanding of caching mechanisms (Redis preferred) and streaming services like Kafka, SQS, or Kinesis.
•	Hands-on experience with observability tools, including logging and monitoring best practices.
•	At least 2 years of experience working with large-scale SaaS products (4-10 years old), with clear examples of end-to-end feature ownership.
•	Ability to lead a small team, ensuring high-quality and timely deliveries.
•	A problem-solving mindset and a strong sense of ownership and accountability, especially in fast-paced, early-stage startup environments.
highlightedJobListings.title: Software Technical Lead - Python

highlightedJobListings.description:
About Astuto
We aim to build an AI-first Cloud Efficiency Platform that helps businesses maximize the ROI on public cloud investments.
Given the increase in complexity and cost of cloud infrastructure and services, this space has an enormous opportunity. Over $600 billion is being spent on the public cloud, and an estimated $180 billion is being wasted. In addition, lack of expertise as complexity and scale increase is a big challenge for organizations.
Astuto is establishing an engineering team in Bengaluru and is on the lookout for exceptional founding engineers to drive our vision.

Job Description:
We are looking for a skilled and motivated Python Developer to join our development team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Python,Flask, FastAPI, and database technologies (SQL/NoSQL). 

Responsibilities:
•	Develop and maintain backend services with python (FastAPI)
•	Design, implement, and maintain RESTful web services and APIs to support various front-end applications
•	Understanding of SQL/NoSQL databases, Redis and Kafka. Open to research and adopt new tech stack/s when needed
•	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver high-quality software.
•	Follow agile development methodologies, participate in sprint planning, and contribute to the development process.
•	Troubleshoot and debug issues in both development and production environments

Qualifications:
•	Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field
•	1.5+ years of proven experience and deep understanding of python programming language, its idioms, and effective python coding practices.
•	Good to have experience with FastAPI framework and background tasks
•	Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases, and the ability to optimize data storage and retrieval
•	Familiarity with Docker and CI/CD pipelines. Good to have knowledge of Kubernetes
•	Effective communication and collaboration with cross-functional team

highlightedJobListings.description:
We are looking for Senior Backend Engineers multiple positions to join our team immediately and help us build and scale our platform. The ideal candidate will have experience with modern backend frameworks and database technologies, as well as experience with cloud infrastructure and microservices architecture. You will work closely with the product and data teams to design and implement scalable and reliable backend systems that power our AI platform. You will also contribute to developing and maintaining our existing codebase, as well as debugging and troubleshooting issues that arise in production.

Responsibilities:
* Design and implement scalable and reliable backend systems that power our AI platform
* Develop new features and maintain existing codebase using modern backend frameworks and database technologies
* Collaborate with the product and data teams to understand requirements and design efficient and effective solutions
* Debug and troubleshoot issues that arise in production
* Optimize code performance and scalability
* Write and maintain unit and integration tests to ensure code quality
* Contribute to the continuous improvement of our development process and tools

Requirements:
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related field
* 3+ years of experience in building high performance and scalable software 
* Strong knowledge of databases (e.g. MySQL, Cassandra, ElasticSearch) and data modeling
* Experience with cloud infrastructure (e.g. AWS, GCP, Azure) and microservices architecture
* Strong understanding of RESTful API design and implementation
* Familiarity with version control systems (e.g. Git)
* Experience with unit and integration testing
* Strong problem-solving and debugging skills
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills
* Self-motivated and able to work independently as well as in a team environment
* Experience with machine learning or data analytics
* Familiarity with containerization (e.g. Docker, Kubernetes)
* Experience with continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD)

Benefits:
• Competitive base salary.
• Performance-based bonus.
• Stock options.


At Infinite Analytics, we are committed to creating a vibrant and supportive work environment that encourages continuous learning and collaboration. Our company culture is centered around customer success and innovation, which has enabled us to build a loyal customer base across various industries.

We value our employees and offer a comprehensive benefits package, including a competitive salary, performance-based bonuses, and stock options. Additionally, we provide the latest technology tools and resources to help you perform your job efficiently and effectively. Our inclusive and collaborative work environment fosters learning and professional development to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies.

***Salary commensurate with experience and grade/range

**Hiring Process** 

1. Fill this [candidate form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdmLY6DHeCpojPnrbtQuzv3Bc0BIC3UlgI2eyTNeWERMX2ZSA/viewform) and submit your details 
2. Submit your resume to jobs@infiniteanalytics.com
3. HR team will review the resume and schedule an Intro call
4. Once we match you with a role, we will ask you to complete an assignment to test your hands on skills
5. Tech Interview
6. HR Interview
7. Reference check
8. Offer

Start exploring career options at Infinite Analytics by completing steps #1 and #2 today! 

Join our team and be part of a company that is transforming the world of AI and consumer insights. Make a difference and take your career to the next level with us.
highlightedJobListings.title: Senior Backend Engineer - multiple positions

highlightedJobListings.description:
Join Zania, a pioneering AI Security startup based in San Francisco, on a mission to develop enterprise-grade autonomous AI agents for security. Our distinguished team hails from prestigious tech giants such as Microsoft, Airbnb, Google, Meta, AWS, and Instacart, and our clientele includes top-tier multi-billion dollar enterprises and Fortune 500 companies. We're seeking a highly skilled AI Engineer with a passion for advancing AI technologies to play a pivotal role in developing and optimizing our innovative solutions.

**Responsibilities**:

* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams including researchers, data scientists, and software engineers to develop and improve our AI systems.
* Fine-tune large language models and implement novel search and QA algorithms to enhance the capabilities of our AI agents.
* Develop and evaluate large systems of interconnected LLMs, addressing engineering constraints such as latency and model inference costs.
* Work directly with our founder and customers to understand requirements and deliver impactful AI solutions.
* Tackle unsolved research and engineering problems, particularly those relevant to LLMs in production environments.
* Create AI Agents

**Requirements**:

* Professional experience building world-class, world-scale software solutions.
* 3-5+ years of experience in machine learning engineering, with a strong understanding of ML principles and techniques.
* Experience working with large language models (LLMs) and implementing AI systems at scale.
* Demonstrated ownership mindset, self-learning abilities, curiosity, and a drive to push the boundaries of technology.
* Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for tackling complex challenges in AI engineering.
* Experience with Python, Langchain, Llama Index, or other relevant AI frameworks.


**What We Offer**:
Opportunity to work on groundbreaking AI  products and contribute to solving some of the toughest challenges in the industry.
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Collaborative and inclusive work culture with opportunities for professional growth and development.
highlightedJobListings.title: Lead AI Engineer / Data Scientist

highlightedJobListings.description:
**Shape the Future of Security Compliance with Zania:**   
At Zania, we're redefining security compliance with cutting-edge AI solutions. Our mission is to empower enterprises with intelligent AI agents that streamline security compliance processes with unmatched precision.

Our team features top innovators from industry leaders like Microsoft, Airbnb, Brex, Reddit, Instacart, Oracle, and Zoho. Backed by a client portfolio that includes Top 10 audit firms, Fortune 500 companies, and world-renowned universities, we’re already making a significant impact in the industry.

We’re looking for exceptional engineers to join our journey. If you’re a 10X engineer who thrives on solving challenging problems, is eager to leave a lasting impact, and values working with a team of world-class talent, we want to hear from you.

**Responsibilities:**

- Design, implement, and maintain highly scalable and reliable backend systems using Python and FastAPI.

- Leverage Azure to enhance system capabilities and performance.

- Continuously improve application performance, code quality, and system reliability.

- Perform rigorous testing to ensure robustness and maintainability of the codebase.

- Collaborate closely with esteemed clients and cross-functional teams to craft a world-class product of global scale, demonstrating an ownership mindset and strategic product vision.

**Requirements:**

- Minimum of 5 years of professional experience in backend software development.

- Strong proficiency in Python and FastAPI.

- Experience with cloud platforms, particularly Azure.

- Product development experience, with a focus on backend systems.

- Experience with cloud platforms such as Azure or AWS.

- Self-motivated, responsible and driven.

- Demonstrated ownership mindset, self-motivation, curiosity, and a drive to innovate within the realm of advanced technology.

**What We Offer:**

- Opportunity to lead and contribute to the development of cutting-edge AI applications, while fostering a collaborative and innovative team culture.

- Competitive salary and equity packages tailored to your preference for ownership.

- Fully distributed work culture, allowing you to work and reside wherever suits you best.

- Generous paid time off policy.

At Zania, we uphold diversity and inclusion as fundamental pillars of our culture. We actively encourage applications from individuals belonging to underrepresented groups in the tech industry.

If you're passionate about shaping the future of AI-driven security, possess strong leadership skills, and have the technical expertise to thrive in a dynamic, innovative environment, we invite you to join our team and make an impact.
highlightedJobListings.title: Senior Software Engineer (Python)

highlightedJobListings.description:
At Qiro, we are a dynamic team united by a mission to foster a fair, transparent, and decentralized global lending market. Our focus lies in developing an institutional private credit protocol that seamlessly connects on-chain lenders with off-chain borrowers.

**What we’re looking for:**
Currently, we are seeking a Senior Backend Engineer to take charge of designing, developing, and maintaining our backend systems. As a pivotal team member, you will play a key role in ensuring the resilience, scalability, and security of our systems. You’ll collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including smart contract developers, frontend developers, product managers, and designers, to deliver high-quality software solutions that drive our success. 

**What You'll Do:**
- Build and contribute to backend systems supporting Qiro products, interacting with different blockchain networks and external systems.
- Design and develop scalable and resilient client-facing backend APIs, internal services, and scripts for efficient execution of business logic.
- Architect and implement scalable backend solutions capable of handling growing user loads and evolving business requirements.
- Develop and maintain comprehensive test suites, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the reliability of backend systems.
- Implement monitoring and debugging tools to proactively identify and resolve issues, ensuring high system availability.
- Collaborate with engineers, QA, and DevOps teams to deliver high-quality code within project timelines.
- Document code, APIs, and technical processes to facilitate knowledge sharing within the team and support the onboarding of new developers.

**What Makes a Great Candidate:**
- Strong experience in Node.js and Typescript, with proficiency in frameworks like ExpressJS (additional stacks may be used based on project requirements).
- Previous work experience in the blockchain/DeFi space, demonstrating a strong technical understanding of the EVM ecosystem.
- Proven expertise in developing backend REST APIs at scale, handling high request volumes while maintaining low latency and optimal system performance.
- Extensive professional experience in software design and architecture.
- Deep knowledge of testing frameworks and principles.
- Passion for exploring new technologies and the ability to autonomously evaluate them, making suggestions for improvement.

**Nice to Have:**
- Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science.
- Smart contract development experience.
- Understanding of real-world asset tokenization on-chain.

**Benefits:**
- Competitive salary with regular reviews.
- Flexible working hours.
- Opportunities for professional growth—your success has no limits when you're driven to excel.

If you are excited about the prospect of contributing to our mission and possess the skills and passion we're looking for, we invite you to be a part of our innovative journey at Qiro. Apply now to join a team where success knows no bounds!
highlightedJobListings.title: Senior Backend Engineer

highlightedJobListings.description:
**Who we are:**

At Qiro, we are a dynamic team united by a mission to foster a fair, transparent, and decentralised global lending market. Our focus lies in developing an institutional private credit protocol that seamlessly connects on-chain stablecoin lenders with off-chain fintech borrowers.

**What are we looking for:**

Are you passionate about frontend development but also have a solid understanding of the entire stack? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you! We are seeking a talented individual to take on the role of a Senior Web3 FullStack Developer, with a primary focus on frontend development.

**Responsibilities:**

1. Frontend Development: Bring our frontend designs to life as interactive applications using the latest technologies, tools and practices.
2. Backend Development: Write a combination of serverless functions and subgraphs that integrate with the Ethereum blockchain to support our frontend applications.
3. Smart Contract Interaction:* understand smart contract development and how to interact with them.
4. SDKs and Clients: Implement, test, and audit open-source client libraries that are used to interact with Qiro smart contracts.

**Skills and Qualifications:**

* 3+ years full-time experience in Engineering at a software or fintech organisation.
* 2+ years full-time experience on a blockchain-based project, with knowledge of smart contract development.
* Strong working experience as a full-stack developer using React, GraphQL, TypeScript & NodeJS.
* Experience in CI/CD, hosting pipelines for managing app deployments.
* Experience working with SQL and NOSQL based database architecture. 
* Ability to write clean, maintainable, testable, and reusable codes.

**Nice to have:**

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science.
* Hands-on Expertise in CI/CD, AWS/GCP.
* Smart contract development experience.
* Understanding of real-world asset tokenization on-chain.
* Prior experience working with a DeFi/web3 startup.

**Benefits:**

* Competitive salary with regular review.
* Flexible working hours.
* Opportunities for professional growth—your success has no limits when you're driven to excel.

*If you are excited about the prospect of contributing to our mission and possess the skills and passion we're looking for, we invite you to be a part of our innovative journey at Qiro. Apply now to join a team where success knows no bounds!*
highlightedJobListings.title: Senior Web3 Full Stack Developer

highlightedJobListings.description:
We are looking for a skilled .NET Developer with 2 to 5 years of experience to join our team in Viman Nagar, Pune. The ideal candidate should have expertise in .NET Core, ASP.NET MVC, C#, and SQL, along with hands-on experience in developing scalable web applications and APIs.

**Responsibilities:**

Develop, enhance, and maintain web applications using .NET Core, ASP.NET MVC, and C#.
Design and implement RESTful Web APIs for seamless communication between systems.

Work with Entity Framework and LINQ for efficient database operations.

Optimize SQL queries and stored procedures for better performance.

Deploy and manage applications on Microsoft Azure.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.

Ensure application security, performance, and scalability.

Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing systems.

**Required Skills**

2-5 years of experience with C#, ASP.NET MVC, and .NET Core

Strong knowledge of .NET Framework 4.0/4.5 and .NET Core

Experience with WCF/Web Services, LINQ, Web API, Entity Framework

Proficiency in OOPS concepts, SOLID principles, and design patterns

Strong MS SQL Server skills and ability to write optimized queries

Experience with IIS Architecture and MVC Architectural Patterns

Knowledge of cloud computing concepts

Experience developing microservices (highly preferred)

If you have experience designing truly scalable applications, understand secure API programming practices, and want to see your work successfully in the market, we'd love to hear from you!
highlightedJobListings.title: .Net Developer

highlightedJobListings.description:
**About the Role**

We're seeking a skilled Backend Engineer to design, develop, and maintain scalable backend APIs and services and fine tune learning models. You'll consistently write high-quality, maintainable code while continuously exploring new methods and practices. You will also experiment with various Large Language Models (LLMs) and leverage cutting-edge techniques to fine-tune and optimize prompts for improved performance, relevance, and accuracy.


**About the Company**

Sobek.ai (and DoctorPlan) are working together on building an AI learning model for healthcare research. With support from the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, the company is developing a scalable system that will enable healthcare researchers across the world to collaborate in ways that have never been possible. 

This is a unique opportunity to join a company that is changing the way pharmaceutical companies, bio technology companies, and participants in the entire drug discovery supply chain work together, using AI / LLMs to solve healthcare’s largest global problems. 

Imagine working on AI models that enable healthcare researchers across the world to learn from the largest repository of research available - and speed up drug discovery and research like never before. 


**What You'll Do**
* Design, develop, and maintain scalable backend APIs and services.
* Consistently write high-quality, maintainable code while continuously exploring new methods and practices.
* Experiment with various Large Language Models (LLMs) and leverage cutting-edge techniques to fine-tune and optimize prompts for improved performance, relevance, and accuracy.
* Work on technology that powers the AI generation - learning models, prompt pipelines, vector databases, RAG and more.


**What We're Looking For**
* Experience: Min. 4+ years of experience in Backend
* Cloud Experience: Experience working with at least one cloud provider AWS, Azure, GCP
* Programming: Experience programming with at least one software programming language.
* ML Frameworks: Experience in ML framework, e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow etc.
* Good to have:
    * Experience in NodeJS and ReactJS
    * Experience with AWS.
    * Deep expertise in Neural networks.
    * You are excited about the challenge of figuring out unsolved problems!

highlightedJobListings.description:
### **The Lumia Group 
### Head of Systems – End-to-End Supply Chain Automation (Remote)**

What You’ll Do
●	Develop and Execute the Supply Chain Tech Strategy: Define a comprehensive technology roadmap for an end-to-end supply chain covering procurement, inventory management, order management, warehousing, and distribution. You will set the vision for how goods flow from suppliers to customers in a seamless, automated way.

●	Architect and Implement Systems from Scratch: Evaluate, select, and deploy the core platforms (ERP, OMS, WMS, and other key systems) that will form our supply chain backbone. Design the integrations between these systems to ensure real-time data flow and a single source of truth across our supply chain.

●	Drive Automation & Innovation: Identify opportunities to automate and optimize every step of the supply chain. This includes implementing warehouse automation (robotics, conveyor systems, IoT sensors), order processing automation (workflow engines, RPA), and data-driven tools (AI/ML for demand forecasting, inventory optimization, route planning). You’ll pilot and integrate cutting-edge technologies to improve efficiency, accuracy, and speed.

●	Lead End-to-End Project Delivery: Oversee the full lifecycle of system implementation projects – from requirements gathering and solution design to vendor management, testing, and go-live. You will ensure projects are delivered on time and within budget, managing risks and stakeholder expectations along the way.

●	Collaborate Cross-Functionally: Work closely with internal teams to align system capabilities with business needs. Ensure that process design and system configuration support operational workflows and scalability for LOADE and future brands.

●	Build and Mentor a High-Performing Team: Hire and lead a team of system analysts, solution architects, and project managers (as needed) to support the implementation and ongoing management of supply chain systems. Foster a culture of innovation, ownership, and continuous improvement within the team.

●	Manage External Partners: Engage and coordinate with external technology vendors, consultants, and integration partners. You will negotiate contracts, define scopes, and oversee partners during ERP/OMS/WMS implementations or when deploying automation solutions in warehouses.

●	Ensure Scalability, Security & Reliability: Establish governance for system maintenance, upgrades, and data integrity. Implement robust processes for monitoring performance, security, and data quality across all supply chain systems. Ensure the architecture is scalable and flexible to support rapid growth and new business models or brand launches.

●	Champion Continuous Improvement: Once systems are live, continually analyze supply chain performance data to identify bottlenecks or enhancement opportunities. Drive iterative improvements and new feature rollouts to keep our supply chain capabilities best-in-class.

●	Strategic Leadership: Act as the supply chain technology thought leader at The Lumia Group. Stay abreast of industry trends and emerging technologies, and advise the executive team on how to leverage them. Your insights will help shape not just our technology, but also our overall supply chain strategy and innovation roadmap.

Who You Are
●	Seasoned Supply Chain Technology Expert: You have extensive experience (10+ years) in designing and implementing supply chain systems in a retail, e-commerce, or FMCG environment. Your background might include roles such as Senior Solutions Architect, Technical Architect, or Product Owner focused on supply chain and logistics.

●	End-to-End Systems Knowledge: Deep understanding of supply chain execution processes and the software that powers them – including ERP (enterprise resource planning for procurement, finance, inventory), OMS (order management systems for sales channels and fulfillment), WMS (warehouse management systems for distribution centers), and ideally TMS (transportation management for logistics). You know how these systems integrate and have led implementations or major enhancements for them.

●	Automation & Innovation Mindset: Passionate about leveraging technology to streamline operations. You stay up-to-date on emerging supply chain tech – from warehouse robotics and IoT tracking devices to AI-driven forecasting and decision support. You have a track record of introducing automation (software or hardware) to eliminate manual work and improve accuracy.

●	Strategic Thinker and Hands-On Builder: You can craft a big-picture architecture and long-term plan, but you’re equally comfortable rolling up your sleeves to solve technical problems or configure a system. You excel at breaking down ambitious goals into actionable plans. In prior projects, you’ve taken ideas from concept to reality in lean, fast-paced environments.

●	Leadership & Team Collaboration: An inspiring leader and team player. You have experience leading cross-functional initiatives and perhaps managing a small team or mentoring others. You communicate clearly, listen to diverse viewpoints, and build consensus to drive projects forward. Working closely with operations managers, engineers, and executives comes naturally to you.

●	Entrepreneurial Drive: Thrives in a build-from-scratch setting. Ambiguity or a blank canvas doesn’t intimidate you – it energizes you. You are proactive, resourceful, and resilient, able to adapt as requirements evolve. Your mindset is geared toward growth and figuring out what’s needed to achieve it.

●	Customer-Focused & Results-Oriented: You always consider the end customer and business impact in every system or process design. You set high standards for yourself and others, measuring success by tangible improvements in service levels, speed, and cost efficiency.

●	Excellent Communicator: Able to translate between business and tech. Whether it’s pitching a vision to the C-suite, training front-line staff on a new tool, or negotiating with a software vendor, you communicate effectively and confidently at all levels.

●	Background & Education: A Bachelor’s or Master’s in Engineering, Computer Science, Supply Chain Management or related field is preferred. Professional certifications in project management or supply chain (e.g. PMP, CSCP) are a plus. More importantly, your experience and mindset set you apart. 

Why Join Us
●	Make a Lasting Impact: Build something big from the ground up. This is a unique chance to architect the entire supply chain platform that will power a growing portfolio of brands. Your work will directly enable our company’s growth and will be felt by employees and customers for years to come.

●	Greenfield Opportunity: No legacy systems to hold you back. You’ll have the freedom to choose modern technologies and design a state-of-the-art system with a focus on automation and efficiency. It’s a playground for innovation and creativity in supply chain tech.

●	Strategic Leadership Role: As the Head of Systems, you’ll be a key voice in the leadership team. You will collaborate closely with founders and executives, influencing not just technology decisions but also the broader business strategy. Your insights will shape how we scale and expand into new markets.

●	Innovative Culture: Join a company that values innovation, agility, and ownership. The Lumia Group operates with the energy of a startup and the backing of an established business. You’ll work with passionate, forward-thinking colleagues in an environment where bold ideas are encouraged and rapid experimentation is the norm.

●	Build Your Team & Legacy: You won’t just join a company; you’ll help build it. You’ll have the opportunity to recruit and develop a talented team around you. Together, you’ll establish best practices and a performance-driven culture in supply chain operations. This is your chance to craft a legacy as a leader who built a world-class operation from scratch.

●	Growth and Development: As our brands grow, so will your role. We offer a path for long-term career growth, including potential regional or global responsibilities as we expand. You’ll also have access to professional development opportunities, conferences, and the ability to experiment with the latest technologies in the field.

●	Competitive Rewards: We offer a competitive compensation package including salary, performance bonus. We believe in rewarding the people who drive our success.

Join us at The Lumia Group and be the architect of a cutting-edge, automated supply chain that will set new standards in retail. If you’re ready to combine strategy with execution and build something truly special, we’d love to meet you. Apply now to become the driving force behind LOADE’s supply chain revolution and our future brand successes.
highlightedJobListings.title: Head of Systems – End-to-End Supply Chain Automation

highlightedJobListings.description:
ParallelDots Inc. is a fast-growing global retail image recognition company that provides real-time retail shelf monitoring solutions and advanced retail analytics to worldwide FMCG manufacturers and retailers. ShelfWatch is an AI-image recognition platform that automatically checks retail shelf conditions and compliance from store images captured by field reps during store audits. Today, ShelfWatch is used by major Fortune 500 FMCG companies to track their retail in-store sales execution daily and enable FMCG organizations to make data-driven decisions that have a huge impact on their store sales. ParallelDots is led by the alumni of IIT KGP and BITS Pilani, with its headquarters in the USA and offices across India, UK, Europe, and Mexico. ParallelDots’ solutions are deployed in over 40 countries globally, covering over 1 million stores and processing over 10 million photos per month.

ParallelDots is seeking a skilled Backend Developer with a minimum of 1 year experience in Python and expertise in the Flask framework. The ideal candidate should have hands-on experience with RESTful APIs, MySQL, and NoSQL databases.

 

Responsibilities:
1. Develop and maintain robust and scalable Backend solutions using Python, Flask and MySQL.

2. Write clean, testable and modular code, primarily in Python, to create microservices.  

3. Collaborate with the front-end development team to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.  

4. Conduct through testing and debugging to identify and fix potential issues or bottlenecks in the system.  

5. Develop and maintain documentation for the Backend systems, including APIs specifications and technical documentation.  

6. Experience with cloud technologies like AWS/Google Cloud would be an added advantage.

 

Requirements:
1. Minimum 1 year experience in Python development.

2. Hands-on experience in the Flask framework.

3. Proficiency in working with RESTful APIs, MySQL and NoSQL databases.

4. Proven track record in developing and maintaining scalable Backend solutions.

5. Strong ability to write clean, testable and modular code.

6. Collaboration skills to work closely with the front-end development team.
7. Conduct through testing and debugging to ensure system stability.

8. Experience with cloud technologies, specifically AWS/Google Cloud, is a plus.
highlightedJobListings.title: Backend Developer

highlightedJobListings.description:
To Apply, please use the following link: https://www.careers-page.com/assetintel/job/L346RYR8

THIS JOB IS ONLY AVAILABLE TO INDIVIDUALS LIVING IN **INDIA**. NO RECRUITERS OR AGENCIES, PLEASE.

## About AssetIntel
AssetIntel is a software company that develops asset management software products for the transportation infrastructure industry. Our clients include state transportation agencies, city governments, toll authorities, transit agencies, the Federal Highway Administration (FHWA), and civil engineering firms. For more information, visit our website.

## Job Description
We are looking for passionate and experienced software developers with 5+ years of industry experience. You will be working in an agile and highly energetic startup to build a portfolio of products, reporting solutions, and more. By joining the AssetIntel team, you will have the opportunity to lead the development of a variety of tool-sets spanning backend and mobile apps across different areas, including asset management, inspection management, capital management, IoT, and more. Our infrastructure primarily runs on Azure.

As a Software Developer, you will work on multiple projects, analyze requirements, provide estimates, and be involved in the complete software development lifecycle.

At AssetIntel, we believe that every developer is responsible for code ownership and works on the product's complete lifecycle, including design, development, testing, deployment, and support.

## Technical Stack
* Database: SQL Server on Azure Cloud, Azure Table Storage
* Backend: .NET Core
* DevOps: Azure Pipelines
* Cloud:  Azure

## Responsibilities
Our team is looking for strong developers to help us build the aforementioned set of tools and deliver high-quality solutions in an agile environment. Some of the core responsibilities include:

* Design, develop, implement, and maintain web and/or mobile applications in a highly collaborative environment.
* Contributing to the complete technology stack, especially the backend and databases.
* Continuously innovate and strategize on making our applications faster and more resilient.
* Prioritize and manage work while adhering to critical project timelines in a fast-paced environment.
* Share a passion for design and technology.

## Skills and Experience
* Minimum 4 years of experience as a backend or full-stack developer. Applications with less than 4 years of experience will not be considered.
* Knowledge of data structures and object-oriented programming (OOP).
* Knowledge of database design and understanding of SQL queries.
* Experience working with cloud-based systems.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Self-driven and able to contribute as part of a small team.
* Experience working with JavaScript and/or JavaScript frameworks is a big plus.​

## Benefits and Perks
* Work remotely from anywhere in India.
* Market-competitive total compensation package and performance-based bonus.
* Generous vacation policy.
* Company-paid medical coverage.​
* Plenty of opportunities for growth, working alongside some of the brightest minds in the industry.
highlightedJobListings.title: Backend Engineer (Remote - India)

Key Responsibilities :

- Develop, test, and maintain robust backend applications using Python and frameworks like Django/FastAPI/Flask.

- Design and develop RESTful APIs and integrate them with frontend applications.

- Optimize application performance and ensure scalability.

- Work with databases (SQL & NoSQL) such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, or Redis.

- Implement authentication and authorization mechanisms (OAuth, JWT, etc.).

- Collaborate with frontend developers, DevOps, and other teams to ensure smooth deployment and operation.

- Write clean, scalable, and maintainable code following best practices.

- Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve technical issues in production environments.

- Work with containerization tools (Docker, Kubernetes) and CI/CD pipelines.

- Ensure security and data protection best practices.

Required Skills & Qualifications :

- 5+ years of experience as a Python Backend Developer.

- Proficiency in Python and frameworks like Django, Flask, or FastAPI.


- Strong experience in RESTful API development and integration.

- Knowledge of databases (SQL & NoSQL) and ORM frameworks.

- Familiarity with microservices architecture and distributed systems.

- Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP.

- Hands-on experience with message brokers like RabbitMQ or Kafka.

- Good understanding of security best practices, authentication, and authorization.

- Experience with unit testing and automated testing frameworks.

- Knowledge of Git, CI/CD pipelines, and Agile methodologies.

Good to Have :

- Experience with GraphQL.

- Familiarity with Celery for asynchronous task processing.

- Exposure to AI/ML frameworks (if applicable).

Benefits :

- Competitive salary

- Health and wellness benefits

highlightedJobListings.description:
**Job Description:**
We are seeking a talented Golang Developer to join our team in developing a peer-to-peer (P2P) application. As a key member of our development team, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining robust and scalable P2P solutions using the Go programming language. The ideal candidate is passionate about distributed systems, has experience with network protocols, and is excited about building innovative P2P applications.

**Duties and Responsibilities:**

* Design, develop, and maintain a distributed P2P application using Golang.
* Implement peer discovery, routing, and communication protocols.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define requirements and design architecture.
* Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following best practices and coding standards.
* Optimise performance and scalability of the P2P network.
* Implement security measures to ensure data privacy and integrity in the P2P network.
* Develop monitoring and diagnostic tools to troubleshoot and debug issues.
* Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in P2P networking and distributed systems.
* Participate actively in code reviews, providing constructive feedback to fellow team members.
* Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and tools that promote efficient project management and teamwork.

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
* Proven experience in software development, with at least 5 years of experience using Golang. Preferably have at least 3 years of experience in blockchain development and GoLang.
* Strong understanding of networking concepts and protocols.
* Deep understanding of blockchain technology, including Ethereum, Polygon, Bitcoin, Solana, and other networks.
* Experience with P2P networking and distributed systems.
* Proficiency in concurrent programming and asynchronous communication.
* Familiarity with cryptographic algorithms and security protocols.
* Knowledge of any or all of the following technologies is desired: Kafka, Postgres, Golang, Git, gRPC, Docker, GraphQL Experienced in continuous integration (CI), continuous deployment (CD) and continuous testing (CT)
* Solid understanding of test-driven development, including unit, component, functional, system integration and regression tests. 
* Ability to work independently and in a team environment, with excellent communication skills.
highlightedJobListings.title: Golang Developer

highlightedJobListings.description:
Senior Backend Developer | Full-time | Remote
* [Space Runners](https://spacerunners.com/) | Fashion Tech Platform
* [Ablo](https://ablo.ai/) | AI Design Tool

**About Space Runners**
Space Runners is a fashion-tech platform that builds the most intuitive tools to enable anyone to create, innovate, collaborate, and market their creativity.

Our vision is to enable new ways of self-expression, and our mission is to build the most intuitive tools that empower creators and brands to design, collaborate, and monetize in new ways.

**Key Highlights**
1. Raised a $10M seed round with Polychain, Pantera, Accel, and Jump Crypto to define the intersection of Web3, AI, and Fashion.
2. Primary product: ABLO.ai — a cutting-edge fashion tech platform revolutionizing the creator economy by merging AI-powered design tools, e-commerce, and blockchain technology.
3. What is ABLO.ai?
* Empowers creators, brands, and consumers to design, own, and monetize custom merchandise effortlessly.
* Democratizes fashion design through AI, allowing anyone to become a fashion entrepreneur.
* Integrates with renowned brands like SmileyWorld, Champion, Balmain, and Crocs, enabling creators to incorporate iconic IP into their merch.
* Features blockchain-backed IP protection to ensure ownership and fair royalties.
* Offers seamless e-commerce functionality for global fulfillment.
* Partners with Story Protocol’s IP marketplace, allowing creators to register, trade, and earn from their designs.

🌍 Our clients and partners span luxury, sports, and streetwear brands, including Balmain, Pangaia, 11TeamSports, Live Nation, Smiley, Ralph Lauren, Crocs, Vans, and more. 

We’re growing our team looking for go-getters to join us - we’re just getting started!

**About the Role**
As a Senior Backend Developer, you will play a critical role in designing and developing the backend systems, data stores, and 3rd party integrations of Space Runners’ platforms. You’ll work closely with machine learning engineers, frontend engineers, and product teams to create high-performing, engaging, and scalable web services.

This role is ideal for someone who loves crafting scalable and performant backends, thrives in fast-paced startup environments, and is excited about working on products at the intersection of AI, e-commerce, and blockchain.

This position reports to the Head of Engineering and is full-time.

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and build out our data layer using tech like Postgres and Redis.
* Build and maintain our suite of API services in Nest.js (developer.ablo.ai).
* Integrate successfully with 3rd party services from partners in e-commerce, web3, and print on demand.
* Interface with machine learning engineers to ensure seamless integration between our API services and our generative AI workloads.
* Monitor system performance and reliability. This position requires participating in an on-call rotation.
* Optimize API performance optimizing Postgres queries and caching
* Debug and troubleshoot issues, ensuring a flawless user experience.
* Stay up-to-date with emerging backend technologies, frameworks, and best practices to continuously improve our platform.

**Essential Skills and Qualifications**
* 5+ years of experience in backend development.
* Strong proficiency in Node.js and Typescript
* Experience with Nest.js is a big plus.
* Strong proficiency in Postgres and Redis
* Strong understanding of Git version control and best practices for collaborative development.
* Knowledge of performance optimization techniques, including asyncronous programming, query optimization, and caching
* Experience working with RESTful APIs, and third-party integrations.
* Strong problem-solving skills with a passion for creative and innovative solutions.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, especially in cross-functional teams.
* Ability to work in a fast-paced startup environment, balancing speed with high-quality execution.
* Continuous learning mindset, staying updated with the latest technologies and best practices.

**Nice-to-Have**
* Experience in Web3 technologies, such as wallet integrations, smart contracts, and blockchain development.
* Background in AI-driven applications, generative design tools, or e-commerce platforms.
* Experience with automated API testing and monitoring frameworks, like Postman

**Why Join Space Runners?**
* Be at the cutting edge of Web3, AI, and digital fashion.
* Work with top-tier investors and partners in the blockchain space.
* Have a direct impact on shaping a fast-growing, engaged community.
* Remote-first culture with a team that values innovation, creativity, and inclusivity.

**Compensation and Benefits**
Space Runners provides:
* A competitive salary, including base, token allocation eligibility, etc..
* Comprehensive benefits.

🚀 Ready to shape the future of self-expression? Apply now and become a core part of our journey!
highlightedJobListings.title: Senior Backend Developer
